body:
Half porn half plot.
Nice balance, keep me cumming

They talk about "Seven Summers" and the fact that they have been locked in that mini world for 70 years. During this time, they dont get old and the MC promises to help them out of the miniworld in the last panel. So we should get part 5 eventually. The girls are not dead but frozen in time. The only dead one is that white haired girl who he fucked in the closet and who manages the miniworld as her paradise where no illict relationships are allowed. The shaman predicted that a man will appear and free them.
I thought the girls are from Himeyuri students from ww2
It seems that it will have a next part because page 57 looks like a teaser. The setting seems to take place in world war I?
This harem series is a masterpiece, hope someone will TL it! ^_^
@LetMeAlone agreed, this needs a TL cause now I need to know the story behind this lucky S O B’s chance at a harem.
Am i the only one weirded out about the page that has a fleet of airplanes and a zeplin?
that's one nice pice of art this series, hope it will get more sequels and translated at some point
